name: APT17, Deputy Dog, APT 17, Tailgater Team, Elderwood, Elderwood Gang, Sneaky Panda, SIG22, Beijing Group, Bronze Keystone, TG-8153, TEMP.Avengers, Dogfish, ATK 2, Operation Aurora, Operation “DeputyDog”, Operation “Ephemeral Hydra”, Operation “RAT Cook”

Heatmap of (sub)techniques for APT17, Deputy Dog, APT 17, Tailgater Team, Elderwood, Elderwood Gang, Sneaky Panda, SIG22, Beijing Group, Bronze Keystone, TG-8153, TEMP.Avengers, Dogfish, ATK 2, Operation Aurora, Operation “DeputyDog”, Operation “Ephemeral Hydra”, Operation “RAT Cook”.
